archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1398
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a CSR I want a 360 view of the customer including the following information so that I can have targeted conversations and provide the best outcome for my customer: - Accounts/Products/Services/Devices - Party Relationships (including Status, Type, Products) - AParty Relationships (including Status, Type, Products) - All Open Case - Notes - Customer Status ( Migrated, Prospect, Lead, Customer …) - Customer Segments - Customer Addresses Past and Future (Localised warnings and faults) - Orders (Booking and Scheduling) - Debit and Credit Status - Know Your Customer Level(e.g. unknown/weak, social/low, passport/facial/drivers licence/high) - Authentication Level (e.g. none, social, basic, biometric/device, MFA) - Outbound Communication History sent via any channel (e.g. voice, Email, SMS …) - Interactions Communication History received via any channel (e.g. Voice, Chat, Email, SMS, Social …)

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
